queries the content of a file.

Source: R/file.R
File_query.Rd

The file has to be parsable by EDP. Otherwise you can use File_download()

Usage

File_query(
  id,
  filters = NULL,
  limit = 10000,
  offset = NULL,
  all = FALSE,
  conn = get_connection()
)

Arguments

id

a File ID

filters

a filter expression as a JSON string.

limit

The maximum number of elements to fetch, as an integer. See also page.

offset

the file offset (starts from 0).

all

whether to fetch all data, by iterating if needed.

conn

a EDP connection object (as a named list or environment)
